title: Aaron Garcia (boxer)
text:
Aaron García (born June 14, 1982) is an American <a href="boxing">boxer</a> in the <a href="Featherweight">Featherweight</a> division. He earned the featherweight <a href="silver%20medal">silver medal</a> at the <a href="2003%20Pan%20American%20Games">2003 Pan American Games</a>.
Professional career.
He made his professional debut on September 18, 2004 against Gerardo Robles. Aaron retired from the boxing in 2006 after an upset loss to the veteran Saul Ochoa, but returned in 2008.
On February 26, 2011 García upset title contender Alejandro Lopez (20-1). The bout was held at the <a href="Palms%20Casino%20Resort">Palms Casino Resort</a> in <a href="Las%20Vegas%20Valley">Las Vegas</a>, <a href="Nevada">Nevada</a>.
